description: Assign a node a UCP manager or worker role

join_token.description: The token from the command 'docker swarm join-token manager/worker' (e.g. SWMTKN-1-0lna8pilvsrl0ul0ie9r0m1s0g6xqhs7gyup2t1b5no3c9fx1n-dxv7s17j6eowpoq3fky2102ex).  The type of token dictates the role assigned.  There is one token for managers and one for workers.
